qa.question: Before you leave, I would like to ask you a few questions as to why you are visiting today. Would you like to continue?
Could you tell me the main reason for your visit today?
What type of hearing loss are you experiencing, and when did you first notice it?
Q: Have you experienced any other symptoms, such as ringing in your ears or dizziness?
Q: How severe would you say the ringing and dizziness are on a scale from 1 to 10, with 10 being the worst?
Q: Have you had any recent illnesses or injuries that could be related to your hearing loss and symptoms?
Q: Have you been exposed to loud noises or environments that might have affected your hearing recently?
